articles.title: Petersburg Co-op Gin unveils their brand-new roller gin
articles.author: Mattie Powers
articles.summary: Petersburg Co-Op Gin launched a new roller gin, designed for extra-long staple cotton. This roller gin uses gentler and more precise process than traditional saw gins, utilizing a Guardian lint cleaner to produce a better cotton sample. The company plans to begin operating the new roller gin by the end of October.

articles.title: PepsiCo packing protein into new product launches
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Muscle Milk, Propel, and Doritos are planning innovations. These innovations suggest upcoming releases or updates for the respective brands.

articles.title: Nik's Wish reveals new Wish Lamp
articles.summary: Nik's Wish presented its new Wish Lamp featuring a new design, lights, and smoke effects on Friday morning.

articles.title: Nike Taps Its Vintage Archive for a Forgotten Hiking Boot Not Seen in 20 Years
articles.author: Jack Seemer
articles.summary: Nike introduced a new model of its boot, offering toned-down black and brown colorways as a street-savvy remaster. A safety-orange variant is also available for those who prefer the original bold style.

articles.title: DreamCloud Mattress Sale—Save Up To 66% On Editor-Loved Beds Right Now
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering savings on beds and bedding bundles during its mattress sale.

articles.title: SM pilots Alfamart franchising to boost MSMEs
articles.author: Philippine Daily Inquirer
articles.summary: Alfamart Philippines, part of the SM group, has launched a franchising program to allow MSMEs to grow alongside its nationwide expansion. The pilot program started in Laguna with two franchise-owned stores in October and August 2024. This reflects SM's commitment to inclusive growth and entrepreneurship.

articles.title: Move from reactive to proactive customer service
articles.author: Iris Meijer
articles.summary: The company is launching the Customer Experience Index (CXI), an AI-powered, real-time measurement framework that transforms customer sentiment into actionable insights.  CXI aims to enhance customer loyalty, reduce churn, and drive business growth by proactively identifying and addressing customer issues, as well as guiding sales teams on appropriate actions based on real-time customer sentiment analysis.

articles.title: PS6 and the new Xbox could arrive the same year – Xbox Generation
articles.summary: Sony is reportedly planning to launch the PlayStation 6 (PS6) in 2027, coinciding with Microsoft's expected release of the next Xbox ('Magnus'). Both consoles are expected to feature significant hardware improvements utilizing AMD technology, with Microsoft potentially adopting a hybrid console-PC approach while Sony maintains a more traditional console design. The new consoles are also anticipated to integrate AI for upscaling graphics and creating realistic NPCs.

articles.title: Jennifer Garner, 53, uses this holy grail moisturizer that's currently on sale — but hurry, October Prime Day is ending soon
articles.author: Nicole Garbanzos
articles.summary: Neutrogena's Hydro Boost Gel Cream Moisturizer, endorsed by Jennifer Garner, is highlighted for its hydrating properties and affordability. The product, containing hyaluronic acid and vitamin B5, is recommended for its lightweight formula, ability to maintain moisture, and positive impact on skin texture. Reviews on Amazon show many shoppers note the impressive affordability and performance.

articles.title: Cleaner reveals best washing machine setting to clean clothes and save money
articles.author: Marni Dixit
articles.summary: CHOICE, an Australian consumer advocacy group, tested over 50 laundry detergents to determine the best performers. Omo Laundry Powder and Trimat Advanced Powder were rated best for front loaders, while Trimat Advanced Powder and Omo Ultimate Powder were rated best for top loaders. Active Expert 3-in-1 Laundry Capsules, Radiant Advanced+ Cleans & Softens 5-in-1 Liquid, and Aldi Green Action Laundry Liquid Concentrate received the lowest ratings.

articles.title: The Ninja Creami Rarely Goes on Sale, but It's Over 20% Off on Amazon Right Now
articles.author: Lauryn Jiles
articles.summary: Ninja Creami Ice Cream Maker is on sale for 22% off on Amazon. This ice cream maker turns ingredients into ice cream, sorbet, gelato, milkshakes and frozen desserts. The Ninja Creami is a bestseller on Amazon with a 4.4-star rating.

articles.title: Nike has reimagined the Air Jordan 5 in the most perfect shade of pink for its anniversary
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Nike is launching a new colorway of the Air Jordan 5 called Medium Soft Pink, celebrating the shoe's 35th anniversary. The launch is scheduled for October 11th at 10 a.m. ET, with the adult sizes priced at $215. The design features a reflective upper, a bump-out collar, jagged midsole, and the number 23 stitched onto the heel.

articles.title: 4 ways to make a brand indispensable
articles.author: Angela Vranich
articles.summary: Little Spoon focuses on product innovation that acknowledges customer emotions, exemplified by their Lunchers product, which combines nostalgic appeal with fresh, nutritious ingredients. Little Spoon also partners with other brands like Dusen Dusen, Rachel Antonoff, Siete, Sauz, and Graza to be part of their lifestyle. The company prioritizes consumer feedback in every touchpoint, including new product launches.

articles.title: This Adorable $11 Charcoal Stick ‘Cleaned My Pores Better Than Actual Soap'
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Several skincare products from companies such as PanOxyl, CeraVe, La Roche-Posay, L'Oreal, Neutrogena, Dermora, Medicube and Clean Skin Club were on sale during Prime Day. These include acne washes, moisturizers, sunscreens, exfoliating sticks, foot peel masks, facial towels and sheet masks, with discounts ranging from 15% to 53% off, and are praised for their effectiveness in addressing various skin concerns.

articles.title: China's Chance AI Launches in India, Led by Ex-OnePlus and TikTok AI Head Dr Xi Zeng
articles.author: Asianet Newsable English
articles.summary: Chance AI launched its visual-first AI agent, Curiosity Lens, in India, led by former OnePlus Product Director Dr. Xi Zeng. This flagship product allows users to snap a picture and receive instant explanations and context. Chance AI plans to invest in user engagement, creator programs, and culture-led storytelling, aiming to collaborate through campus partnerships and creative alliances while localizing the platform in Indic languages.

articles.title: Nolah Evolution Mattress Review 2025
articles.author: Bridget Chapman
articles.summary: The Nolah Evolution Mattress, a hybrid mattress from Nolah, is now available in three firmness levels (plush, luxury firm, and firm) and an option for plus-size sleepers (Comfort Plus). The 15-inch mattress combines pressure-relieving foams and zoned coils with reinforced edges and features a border gusset for airflow and carrying handles. The plush model provides a soft, hugging feel with cushioning and pressure relief, while the luxury-firm model suits side, back, and combination sleepers, and the firm model offers extra support for heavier sleepers.

articles.title: Sense+ opens skincare boutique in Great Neck
articles.author: Long Island Business News
articles.summary: Sense+ Skincare & Wellness launched in Great Neck with a grand opening on October 18.

articles.title: Bien-être mental : 5 exercices simples (mais révolutionnaires) pour prendre soin de soi
articles.author: Francesca Favotto
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company utilizes an agency to create advertising profiles targeting wealthy young parents. These profiles will be used to present ads within partner apps.

articles.title: Stratix Showcases Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 for Transforming Business Mobility
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Stratix Corporation released a video demonstrating how the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 can enhance mobile workflows and productivity for businesses. The Galaxy Z Fold7 combines smartphone portability with a tablet's workspace, integrating with Samsung DeX and offering defense-grade security via Samsung Knox. Stratix provides end-to-end services for the Galaxy Z Fold7 as a Samsung Authorized Ascend Champion Partner.

articles.title: Inyange launches instant milk powder, strengthening Rwanda's dairy sector
articles.author: Fidele Nsengiyumva
articles.summary: Inyange Industries launched its new Instant Whole Milk Powder in Rwanda on October 10th. The product, available in 500g and 1kg sachets, is designed for families and dissolves instantly in water.  The company's Nyagatare facility produces up to 50 tonnes of milk powder per day for domestic and regional markets.

articles.title: I swear by this $18 eyeshadow stick for my under-10-minute makeup routine
articles.author: Victoria McDonnell
articles.summary: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Cream-to-Powder Waterproof Shadow Stick is highlighted as an affordable and high-performing Amazon beauty find. Its cream-to-powder formula offers versatility as a base, solo shadow, or liner and is available in shimmer, metallic, and matte finishes. The product is praised for its long wear and layering possibilities.

articles.title: Pork belly, egg and cheese? This N.J. eatery is thinking outside the breakfast sandwich box.
articles.author: Christopher Burch
articles.summary: Thyme Kitchen & Catering, located in Merchantville, launched two new breakfast sandwiches: a sausage smash sandwich with smashed sausage patties, eggs, Cooper sharp cheese and hot honey on an everything egg bagel and a pork belly sandwich featuring maple bourbon glazed pork belly and Cooper sharp cheese. Ry's Bagels in Glassboro makes the everything egg bagels exclusively for Thyme.

articles.title: Lidl's Middle Aisle gadget will save you hundreds on a new laptop – and it's £15 cheaper than branded version
articles.author: Victoria Taylor
articles.summary: Lidl has launched new tools including the Parkside Electric Precision Screwdriver for £7.99, ideal for repairing electronics; the Parkside Rotary Grinder for £19.99, suitable for various DIY tasks; and the 20V Cordless Drill Driver and SDS-Plus Hammer Drill for £34.99 each. The range also includes a 4V Cordless Screwdriver Rapidfire 2.2 for £12.99 and a £24.99 Angle Grinder.

articles.title: Lidl's Middle Aisle gadget will save you hundreds on a new laptop – and it's £15 cheaper than branded version
articles.summary: Lidl has launched the Parkside Electric Precision Screwdriver for £7.99, ideal for repairing electronics, and the Parkside Rotary Grinder for £19.99, suitable for various DIY tasks. These products offer significant cost savings compared to competitor brands like Precision Electric Screwdriver and Bosch GGS 30 LS Corded Die Grinder respectively.

articles.title: Maxima des Pays-Bas : de l'art d'adapter sa tenue aux circonstances
articles.author: Marta Martínez Tato
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company utilizes an agency to create profiles of young, wealthy parents to present targeted advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: Switching to this plastic-free deodorant (that actually works) might just save your pits and the planet
articles.author: Julia Remillard
articles.summary: No Pong, an all-natural deodorant brand, offers a range of scents including Cool Lavender, Flower Power, and the original baking soda-based formula launched in 2015. The deodorants are aluminum-free, non-toxic, and come in recyclable tins, with a focus on vegan options and unique cream consistency.

articles.title: Horoscope de la semaine prochaine pour tous les signes (du 13 au 19 octobre 2025)
articles.author: Julie Patriat
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes by targeting advertising to profiles of young parents or couples assumed to be wealthy and have a new child. They partner with an agency to create these profiles, which are then used to present advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: Olive Young opens 'Hair & Body Lounge' pop-up
articles.author: KIM MIN-YOUNG
articles.summary: CJ Olive Young has launched the 'Olive Young Hair & Body Lounge,' a pop-up venue in Seoul running through Oct. 26. The lounge showcases about 40 products from Olive Young's signature hair and body brands, offering visitors personalized care experiences and customized solutions through themed zones. Attendees can test products, receive aftercare packages, and obtain exclusive gifts with purchases.

articles.title: NorthLight Celebrates Two Years of Gazelle: Real-Time AI Analytics Driving Revenue Growth for CPG and Retail
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: NorthLight Analytic Partners Inc. is enhancing its Gazelle platform with Agentic AI, enabling autonomous information integration and strategy recommendation. Launched in 2023, Gazelle, an AI-powered analytics system, has seen adoption by CPG leaders and will soon integrate Agentic AI to accelerate growth. The company is also focusing on global expansion and cross-industry deployment of the platform.

articles.title: H&M enters India's beauty market, taking on Lakme, Nykaa, Tira
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: H&M is launching H&M Beauty in India, expanding beyond fashion into the beauty sector. The private-label beauty range, including makeup, perfumes, and beauty tools, will be sold exclusively through H&M stores and online, targeting India's mass-affluent segment with affordable pricing and locally manufactured products.

articles.title: Ninja's new BlendBOSS tumbler blender just launched, and it's already on Amazon in 4 color combos
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the BlendBOSS, a compact tumbler blender, priced at $140. The blender features a 1200-peak-watt motor, stainless-steel blades, a 26-ounce leakproof tumbler, and One-Touch Auto-iQ programs, and is available in four color combinations on the SharkNinja website and Amazon.

articles.title: Middletown's New Ross Dress For Less Store Will Open Saturday
articles.author: Carly Baldwin
articles.summary: Ross Dress for Less will open a new store in Middletown, NJ, on Saturday at 9 a.m. The store will be located at 1115 Rt. 35, in the former Bed, Bath & Beyond building.

articles.title: Xeneta Launches Integrated Rate Management, AI Agents and Indexing Solution at Industry Summit
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Xeneta, a freight rate intelligence platform, has unveiled a new generation of in-platform products. These products are designed to provide enhanced ocean and air freight rate intelligence.

articles.title: Say Goodbye to Night Sweats with These Cooling Bed Sheets
articles.author: Jasmine Washington
articles.summary: Miracle has introduced temperature-regulating bedsheets made with NASA-inspired fabric. The sheets feature antimicrobial silver to prevent bacterial growth and offer temperature and odor regulation. Miracle provides free shipping and a 30-night trial with a 100% refund if not satisfied.

articles.title: 2025 Mini Cooper 2-Door Has Big Heart
articles.author: Grant Miller
articles.summary: Mini is launching the 2025 Mini Cooper, which features a redesigned exterior with sleeker lines and a 9.4-inch OLED display. The base Cooper model has a turbocharged 2.0-liter four-cylinder engine and includes standard features like a head-up display and advanced driver-assistance systems. The pricing starts around $30,000 for the base two-door model.

articles.title: Morrisons announces major delivery change coming to 158 stores
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched its new 'Morrisons Now' service in 158 stores, offering customers delivery of up to 30 items within 60 minutes for a £4.50 fee and £15 minimum order. Morrisons plans to expand the service to 420 stores by the end of October and also introduces shopping trolleys with AI technology.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G launched in India, know price and specifications
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the new Samsung Galaxy M17 5G smartphone in India, featuring a 50MP No shake camera and a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display. The device, powered by an Exynos 1330 chipset, will be available for purchase on October 13 on Amazon, Samsung.com and select retail stores, with prices starting at Rs 12,499.

articles.title: Morrisons makes 1-hour change in more than 400 stores in October
articles.author: Alycia Mcnamara
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched a new service called "Morrisons Now", enabling customers to order up to 30 items for delivery in as little as 60 minutes. The service is available in 159 stores initially, expanding to 420 stores by the end of October, with a delivery fee of £4.50 and a minimum order value of £15.

articles.title: '20 times faster': Speedy ‘drone painter' covers 200 sq ft per minute with ease
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: Lucid Bots has unveiled a new module for its Sherpa drone, enabling it to paint buildings. This expands the drone's capabilities beyond exterior cleaning and window washing to include spray painting and coatings, effectively transforming it into a more versatile modular robotics solution.

articles.title: The Absolute Best Dish Soaps You Can Get in Canada Right Now
articles.author: Angelica Bottaro
articles.summary: ATTITUDE, Nellie's, and The Unscented Company offer various dish soap options. These dish soaps cater to different needs, including tackling tough messes and being environmentally friendly.

articles.title: Wadan Developments launches Seraph, just one month after successful debut of Nuvana
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Wadan Developments launched its second project, Seraph, at an event in Downtown Dubai. This launch follows the debut of Nuvana by Wadan on Dubai Islands one month prior.

articles.title: Master Adulting With These 31 Problem-Solving Products
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: This curated list introduces various new products and services designed to address everyday problems and enhance daily life. Among the highlighted items are a plant-based cooking oil solidifier, Wet & Forget shower cleaner, Yerba Mate Wake Up eye gel, instant cocktail packets, biodegradable drain-cleaning pouches, WD-40 pen, dual-layered toothbrush, pink cleaning paste, chop, slice, and dice unit, dishwasher-cleaning tablets, space-saving compression bags, pore-clearing cleansing oil, unbreakable deep plates, denture cleaner, hair broom with rubber bristles, triple-compartment hamper, black eyeliner stamp, dryer vent cleaning kit, folding board, to-do list pad, Yonanas fruit soft-serve maker, mold and mildew stain cleaner, Liquid I.V. hydration packets, wrinkle release spray, Mac keyboard shortcut sticker, spinning pill dispenser, Thaw Claw, clear quick-drying top coat, blind-spot mirrors, corkscrew Goody hair pins, and silicone oven rack edge protectors.

articles.title: Bluehost Expands Global Coverage with High-Performance Data Centers to Deliver Ultra Low-Latency Hosting
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Bluehost is expanding its global data centers across seven key regions to improve website speed and reliability for small businesses. This expansion aims to deliver faster load times and improved reliability for web and commerce, reducing latency and improving customer experience. Bluehost reduces latency by up to 120 milliseconds, especially for dynamic WordPress sites and provides 2-3X faster page load speed versus market average.

articles.title: Reimagining technology distribution: Sanjib Sahoo and Ingram Microâs platform journey
articles.summary: Ingram Micro is transforming under Sanjib Sahoo's leadership with the Xvantage platform, an AI-powered digital solution. Xvantage combines hardware and cloud subscriptions with personalized suggestions, instant pricing, order tracking, and automated billing to enhance customer experience and business efficiency. This platform reflects a blend of digital intelligence with human empathy.

articles.title: Google's New Feature Allows Users To Try On Shoes Virtually
articles.author: Shiraz Aslam
articles.summary: Google has launched a new AI-powered 'try-on' tool that allows users to virtually try on shoes and clothes by uploading a full-body photo. When looking for shoes on Google Shopping, some listings will feature a 'Try It On' button. If you tap that, the AI replaces the shoes in your uploaded image with different pairs to show how they would look.

articles.title: Dyson's supersonic nural blows competition out the water – and you now can save £120
articles.author: Daisy Lester
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Supersonic Nural hair dryer, featuring scalp protect mode using sensor technology to prevent heat damage. The Nural includes attachment learning, automatically adjusting heat and airflow settings, and has capsule illumination which changes colour depending on the heat being produced. The Supersonic Nural is available for £399.99, designed to speed up styling time while keeping scalp and hair healthier.

articles.title: XCoffee Launches the Region's First AI-Powered Smart Robotic Beverage
articles.author: MEDIA RELEASE
articles.summary: XCoffee, a Singapore-based beverage technology company, has launched its latest AI-powered smart robotic beverage machine, designed to deliver freshly brewed coffee and tea 24/7. The machine uses freshly roasted coffee beans and premium tea leaves, grinding and brewing each cup on demand. XCoffee aims to install 500 units across Singapore and expand throughout ASEAN, targeting high-traffic locations such as shopping malls and offices.

articles.title: Infosys launches Customer Experience Suite for Salesforce
articles.summary: Infosys has launched its Customer Experience Suite for Salesforce. The suite aims to help enterprises scale their digital workforce and enhance customer experiences through advanced AI-driven solutions leveraging Infosys Topaz. It offers Agentforce solutions to streamline customer interactions, automate processes, and deliver personalized experiences.

articles.title: Say It, Edit It - AI Edit Genie Rules Your Gallery with the realme
articles.author: Sania Saeed
articles.summary: Realme is launching the realme 15 Series smartphones on October 13, featuring a Triple 50MP AI Camera and the AI Edit Genie. The AI Edit Genie is a new tool designed to enhance photos effortlessly and allow users to transform photos with a single command. The realme 15 Series comes in three variants: realme 15, realme 15 Pro, and realme 15T.

articles.title: 36 Products You'll Use Once And Say, 'Can This Seriously Be This Good?' (Spoiler: It Can)
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Nivea launched a skin firming gel cream and Gold Bond released a skin-firming neck and chest cream. Venus Visage introduced Teeth Whitening Pens, while Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener available in four shades. Maybelline introduced Lifter Glaze Oil Balm. Catalina Crunch released Cinnamon Toast Protein Cereal.

articles.title: Infosys Launches AI-Powered Customer Experience Suite for Salesforce
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Infosys launched the Customer Experience Suite for Salesforce, integrating Infosys Topaz's AI-driven services with Salesforce's agentic AI technology. The suite includes Agentforce solutions, automating tasks and offering personalized experiences. Client feedback indicates improvements in handling times and reductions in transactional inquiries.

articles.title: 'Unique way to shop': Food First NL launches online farmers' market called Avalon Food Hub
articles.author: Christopher Ballard
articles.summary: Food First NL launched the Avalon Food Hub on October 10th, an online marketplace connecting customers with local farmers and producers. The Northpine Foundation invested over $2 million to support scaling up the social enterprise. The Avalon Food Hub model is based on the successful Western Food Hub and will operate with purchasing windows on select weekends.

articles.title: Morrisons shoppers can order 30 items and get them in 1 hour with new service
articles.author: Jade Wright
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched Morrisons Now, a new delivery service offering fresh food delivered in as little as one hour. Customers can order via Morrisons.com, track their orders, earn More Card points, and access promotions. The service has a £4.50 delivery fee and a minimum order value of £15.

articles.title: 36 Cheap Versions Of Expensive Products You'll Want For Fall
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Lulu Candles introduced scented candles and perfumes with a Le Labo Santal 33 scent dupe. Joy Jolt launched modern and pop culture-themed drinkware and kitchen accessories, a Crate & Barrel look for less. Popilush is a small business that specializes in activewear and shapewear, launching a onesie with long leggings or shorts. Pavoi released classic, modern, and expensive-looking pieces of jewelry, including necklaces, earrings, bracelets, and anklets. Sayso woman owned small business specialized in the first-ever cocktail teabag, perfect for cocktails and mocktails.

articles.title: This 50 MB operating system can resurrect your old PC
articles.author: Tashreef Shareef
articles.summary: Damn Small Linux (DSL) has been relaunched in 2024 as a lightweight Linux distribution aimed at reviving old hardware. The new version, built on antiX 23 i386, is designed to provide a functional desktop environment for basic computing tasks on older machines and includes applications for web browsing, document editing, and file serving.

articles.title: How to Use Liquid Glass on Apple Devices: Love It or Hate It
articles.author: Digital Phablet
articles.summary: Apple introduced Liquid Glass, a new design style, across iOS, iPadOS, WatchOS, TVOS, and MacOS. This design emphasizes content and aims to enhance the user experience with a lively feel.

articles.title: Argos beats Amazon price on 'remarkably fast' Lenovo tablet in Big Red event
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Argos is offering the Lenovo Idea Tab for £127.99 using the code RED20, highlighting its 11-inch 2.5K display, 90HZ refresh rate, and AI Note feature. The sale also includes the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ for £127.20 with the same code, while Amazon has discounted the Amazon Fire HD 10 tablet to £69.99.

articles.title: YouTube expands AI shopping tools to India to boost creator-led commerce
articles.author: Karan Mahadik
articles.summary: YouTube is introducing new AI-powered features to its shopping affiliate program in India, including automatic product tagging in videos and links to brands' websites in Shorts.  Nykaa and Purplle have become merchant partners, allowing creators to monetize content by tagging their products. YouTube will also launch a program designed to discover, enable, and accelerate the next generation of India's beauty and lifestyle creators, with Nykaa.

articles.title: Achieve radiant warmth with the best liquid bronzer
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: L'Oreal Paris Makeup True Match Lumi Glotion is a liquid bronzer doubling as a highlighter, containing moisturizing ingredients and available in four shades. Revlon Skinlights Face Glow Illuminator is an affordable liquid bronzer with pearl pigments for a healthy reflection, available in two colors. Hi Beautiful You BE YOU BODY Body Leg Perfecting Bronzer is a hydrating wash-off bronzer using natural minerals, designed to be streak-free and transfer-resistant.

articles.title: Mega pack of Fairy washing pods that 'smell amazing' have big discount on Amazon
articles.author: Eleanor Fleming
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of Fairy Non Bio All-in-1 PODS Laundry Detergent Washing Liquid Tablets, offering a family-sized bundle with long-lasting freshness and deep cleaning. Also, Ariel Professional Formula Pro+ Powder Detergent Antibacterial is available from Nisbets and Surf 3 in 1 Laundry Washing Detergent Capsules Tropical Lily is available at Sainsburys.

articles.title: 27 Genius Morning Products For Getting Kids Ready
articles.author: Kathleen Shea-Porter
articles.summary: The article features the launch of a variety of new products and services aimed at streamlining morning routines for families. These include items like a mini waffle maker, an over-the-door clothes organizer, an alarm clock, and a cereal dispenser, alongside others available on Amazon.

articles.title: Weekend Wishlist: Top trending fashion and beauty buys to shop now
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Jo Malone has introduced three new scents: Sandalwood & Spiced Apricot, Ginger Biscuit, and Orange Bitters. Trinny London launched Naked Ambition, a vitamin C-infused serum. Goddiva is launching a new denim collection. Iskra Lawrence founded Saltair and launched Santal Bloom Body Butter in the UK. Baylis and Harding have released a bath and body advent calendar. Dynessa Myricks launched Yummy Glow Serum primer. Nobody's Child collaborated with TBCo and launched NC x TBCo Brown Floral Wool Triangle Scarf. Blowfish Malibu launched Venice Double Buckle Boots.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends Z-A release date and how to preload the new major installment in the franchise
articles.author: Mirror Gaming
articles.summary: Pokemon Legends Z-A is scheduled for release on Thursday, October 16 at 12am local time, except in the United States. The game offers a preload option on both Nintendo Switch (4.1GB) and Nintendo Switch 2 (7.7GB) for players who have pre-ordered it, allowing them to play immediately upon release.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G With 50-Megapixel Camera Launched in India: See Price
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy M17 5G in India. This new budget smartphone succeeds the Galaxy M16 5G.

articles.title: Dusk Group smells a broader audience
articles.author: Tim Boreham
articles.summary: Dusk Group has launched male-friendly products with earthier odours and expanded into the 'bath and body' category with items like hand and body washes. The company also launched a Father's Day range and collaborated with brands like Allen's and Willy Wonka. Dusk opened two stores in a new format branded Afterglow.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G with 50MP main camera, 5,000 mAh battery launched in India: Price, specs and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy M17 5G smartphone in India. The phone features a FHD+ AMOLED display, Exynos chipset, a 50MP main camera, and a 5000 mAh battery. It will be available starting October 13, with prices starting at INR 11999 for the 4/128 GB variant.

articles.title: AWS unveils Quick Suite agentic AI platform for enterprises
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: A new suite of services has been introduced, designed for daily business users. This offering is similar to Google's Gemini Enterprise, which was also unveiled on the same day, suggesting a competitive move in the business service sector.

articles.title: These Amazon October Prime Day deals end tonight: 50 best markdowns to shop in Canada before midnight on Apple, Amazon devices and more
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: Amazon Canada is holding its Prime Big Deal Days sale, offering exclusive deals to Prime members on products from brands like Apple, Ninja, and Sony. Discounts include significant savings on items such as electronics, home goods, and beauty products, with the sale extending for four days in Canada.

articles.title: Walmart's $30 Deal: Affordable Top-Quality Nonstick Cookware Set for Home Chefs
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Walmart has launched a $30 nonstick cookware set, including frying pans, a saucepan, and a stockpot. The set features an aluminum base with a nonstick coating (often PTFE), designed for ease of cleaning and even heat distribution. Initial user reviews indicate good performance, especially for egg cooking, with the main concern being the longevity of the nonstick coating.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy M17 with 6 years of OS updates, starts from Rs 12,499
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy M17, a new smartphone in its Monster series, featuring an Exynos 1330 chipset and AI capabilities. It boasts a 6.7-inch sAMOLED screen, a 50MP primary camera, and a 5,000mAh battery with 25W charging, available starting October 13 on Samsung's website, retail stores, and Amazon.

articles.title: Zoom Phone Hits 10 Million Seats
articles.author: Dc Correspondent
articles.summary: Zoom Communications announced that Zoom Phone, its AI-first, cloud phone system, has surpassed 10 million seats globally since its launch in 2019. Built on Zoom's platform, Zoom Phone offers enterprise-grade features and AI innovation to improve collaboration and customer engagement, unifying calling, meetings, messaging, and contact center solutions.

articles.title: Soap And Glory 24-Day 2025 Advent Calendar Review: Is It Worth The Money?
articles.summary: Soap & Glory is launching the House of Glory 24-day advent calendar for 2025, containing body butters, sheet masks, perfumes, lotions and body washes. The calendar costs £48 and contains products worth £92, with Berry and Bright-scented items included, as well as biodegradable sheet masks, under-eye brightening hydrogel patches, and a lip mask.

articles.title: Analysis: Has ChatGPT started its revolution that will crush the competition?
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a platform integrating third-party applications directly into ChatGPT, transforming it into a potential operating system. This allows users to access services like Spotify, Booking.com, and Tripadvisor within ChatGPT. The goal is to establish ChatGPT as a central hub for digital interactions.

articles.title: Google Bets Its Smart Home Future On An Android-Like Strategy For Gemini
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google has launched new Google Home and Nest devices. The company aims to provide unprecedented convenience to users.

articles.title: Jubilant Pharmova arm to invest $300 million in US by FY28 to double sterile injectable capacity
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: A company has launched its new sterile fill and finish line. This represents a new service or product introduction by the company.

articles.title: Wireless has killed audiophile headphones and earbuds, audio companies should do something about it
articles.summary: JBL has launched the Tour One M3 headphones, aiming to replicate the sound quality of their Tour Pro 3 earbuds. Noise has introduced a new line of 'Master' audio products including Master Buds and Master Buds Max, focusing on the price-sensitive market. Sony recently launched the WH-1000XM6 headphones that offer incredible noise cancellation performance.

articles.title: From sneakers to heels: This AI tool lets you preview footwear online to match your festival outfit
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Google has launched an AI-powered virtual try-on feature for footwear, allowing users to see how shoes look on them virtually before buying. The feature uses AI models to analyze body shapes and create realistic previews, and it's being rolled out in the US, Australia, Canada, and Japan. Users can access the feature through Google Search by tapping the 'Try it on' button after uploading a full-length photo.

articles.title: HMD's Touch 4G is a Dumb-Phone
articles.author: Shiraz Aslam
articles.summary: HMD has launched the Touch 4G, a 'dumb-smartphone' available in India for ₹4,999 (about $55). The phone features a 3.2-inch display, runs on RTOS Touch, and supports video calls and group chats through Cloud Phone Service, targeting users seeking a distraction-free device.

articles.title: IOS 16's Liquid Metal Design Emulated by Android Smartphone Manufacturer
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: StellarTech is launching its 'Nova X' series smartphone featuring the 'AuraFlow' design, emulating Apple's 'Liquid Metal' aesthetic. The Nova X uses a multi-layer glass composite creating dynamic color shifts and integrates this with StellarOS 7 for a cohesive visual experience, including haptic feedback synchronization and Corning-developed durable glass.

articles.title: OpenAI Dev Day 2025: Could ChatGPT Become The Next Big Browser?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: OpenAI announced new ChatGPT tools, including AgentKit, app integrations, and expanded APIs at Dev Day 2025. These updates could potentially transform ChatGPT into a primary interface for the internet.

articles.title: Arattai vs WhatsApp: 5 Reasons Why Zoho's Chat App Deserves Your Attention
articles.summary: Zoho has launched Arattai, an instant messaging application. Arattai offers features like no ads, data safety, meeting functionality similar to Google Meet and Zoom, a simple interface, a mentions feature like Slack, and a 'Pocket' feature for saving media and reminders, making it a competitor to WhatsApp.

articles.title: Revolutionary AI-Powered Marketing Platform Launches to Transform Digital Advertising
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: One Click Agency launched its AI-powered marketing platform, which leverages machine learning and real-time analytics. They have also released to the public a limited view of their new technology with the Aura Report and their AI Answering System Janine. Janine can learn a business's value proposition, branding, and communicate in their brand voice in very short periods of time.

articles.title: Best Makeup Removers for Clean, Calm Skin
articles.summary: The product line includes micellar water designed for sensitive skin, enriched with Aloe Vera, Green Tea, and Niacinamide for removing makeup, pollution, and impurities without rinsing. Another offering is a mist-on formula with Vitamin C, Retinol, and Almond Oil, specifically formulated to remove SPF and makeup, leaving the skin soft and glowing.

articles.title: Top Cosmetic Bags & Travel Vanity Cases - Shop Now at Amazon
articles.summary: A new line of mini suitcase-style, waterproof, and durable ABS case makeup organizers is now available. These organizers feature spacious compartments, brush holders, and are designed for both travel and daily use, accommodating makeup, brushes, jewelry, grooming kits, and skincare essentials. They are marketed as stylish, compact, and versatile solutions.

articles.title: Manforce Condoms unleashes new fantasy benchmarks with the on boarding of the latest AI brand ambassador
articles.author: Rahul Dolare
articles.summary: Manforce Condoms, under Mankind Pharma, has launched Myra Kapoor, an AI model, as its new brand ambassador. This introduction is marked by a new television commercial and digital competition titled 'India's Most Desirable' in strategic partnership with FilterCopy. The aim is to foster open conversations about intimacy and reflects an innovative approach to brand communication.

articles.title: Top SaaS MVP Development Company: How to Choose a Partner That Actually Ships
articles.summary: Several MVP development companies are mentioned, each with unique strengths. DBB Software offers lean discovery, clear scope, and steady handoffs. Altoros combines strong product thinking with solid engineering. Vention suits funded teams seeking speed and scale, while other companies like Q agency, Experion Technologies, BairesDev, Simform, Vega IT, Dualboot Partners, and Solvd, Inc. offer specialized services to develop MVP. The article also talks about important aspect of MVP development which is key to launching any new service/product for a company.

articles.title: Galway City food firm signs €7m deal with Lidl - Connacht Tribune
articles.author: Our Reporter
articles.summary: Galmere Fresh Foods has expanded its product range in Lidl stores, introducing new lines of soups, sauces, meal bowls, salads, and dips under Lidl's own-brand Meadow Fresh and Deluxe lines. New additions include Lidl's Deluxe Immune Boosting Curried Butternut Squash Soup, High Protein Mexican Bean Soup, High Protein Chicken Soup, and Deluxe Immune Boosting Root Vegetable Soup. These products are available in Lidl's 231 stores across the island of Ireland, with some exported to the UK and Europe.

articles.title: PepsiCo, fresh off a strong third quarter, says new products will soon boost customer demand
articles.author: Dee-Ann Durbin
articles.summary: PepsiCo anticipates increased consumer demand due to the introduction of new products. These include protein-infused Starbucks coffee, low-sugar Gatorade, and Doritos made with all-natural ingredients.

articles.title: 37 TikTok Items I Bet You Will Add To Cart
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Several companies are launching or updating their product lines. Eos introduces a Strawberry Acai Super Balm, E.l.f. releases a "No Budge" retractable eyeliner and Jelly Pop Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm, and Snif unveils Crumb Couture perfume. RoC launches Multi Correxion Revive + Glow Vitamin C Eye Balm, Dumpling Daughter releases Spicy Sweet Soy sauce, and PanOxyl introduces Acne Banishing Body Spray. L'Oreal Paris offers Infallible Blur-fection Longwear Loose Setting Powder, while Palmer's presents Tahitian Vanilla Lotion, and CeraVe launches Balancing Air Foam Face Wash. Medicube presents Glow Facial Serum, and Dae's Hair releases Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand. Mise En Scéne offers a hair serum, Gold Bond introduces a firming neck and chest cream, Bio-Collagen unveils Real Deep sheet mask. Death Wish introduces Instant Coffee Packets, and Mane Club offers One Hit Wonder, a 10-in-1 hair spray.

articles.title: I tried the new Quality Street Christmas flavour and couldn't believe it
articles.author: Sarah Barltrop
articles.summary: Nestlé has launched a new dark chocolate Quality Street flavor, available exclusively at John Lewis and Waitrose stores for the Christmas season. The flavor's identity is a mystery until December, and it has sparked mixed reactions from tasters, with descriptions ranging from banana to lime. Nestlé aims to 'excite and delight' Quality Street fans with this limited-edition sweet.

articles.title: Ninja Luxe Café Premier: ultimate bean-to-cup coffee machine
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Ninja has released the Luxe Café Premier, a bean-to-cup coffee machine capable of espresso, filter coffee, and cold brew, featuring a built-in grinder with 25 settings and an automated frothing wand. The Luxe Café Premier is available at a discounted price through QVC. Additionally, WalkFit app is being offered with a 61% discount on the four-week plan.

articles.title: Booking.com Launches Innovative AI Tools to Empower Agents and Enhance Client Services
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Booking.com introduced a suite of new AI-powered tools for travel agents including AI-powered property recommendations, a smart itinerary builder, and automated customer service responses with an NLP-powered chatbot. These tools enhance efficiency, personalization, and revenue generation for travel agencies, improving client satisfaction and booking conversion rates.

articles.title: Chivas Players Called to Mexican Classic Act as Content Writers for Virtual Assistant Role: Arizona Updates and Highlights
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Chivas de Guadalajara players participated in a content writing workshop to learn how to create prompts and content for virtual assistants. This initiative, stemming from a partnership with an Arizona-based AI development company, aimed to equip the athletes with skills in prompt engineering, content variation, natural language nuances, and data quality control related to AI-driven applications. The players applied their skills to create content related to El Clásico Nacional, including pre-match analysis and social media copy.

articles.title: Walmart is selling an efficient Android tablet for only $55 during its October Deals Event
articles.summary: Aeezo launched its 10-Inch Android Tablet, featuring the Android 13 operating system, a 10-inch high-definition screen, 6GB of RAM, and 64GB of ROM. The tablet is available in gray or silver for $55 during Walmart's October Deals event, which ends on Oct. 12 and includes a one-year warranty.

articles.title: Guyana joins Early Warning System to tackle 'new psychoactive substances'
articles.author: Denis Chabrol
org: Organisation of American States' Inter-American Drug Abuse Control Commission
articles.summary: The government of Guyana launched its Early Warning System (EWS) to detect and reduce the use of new psychoactive substances (NPS). The system aims to connect law enforcement, health, and forensic sectors to detect emerging drug threats and take preventative action. It represents a new service designed to strengthen law enforcement agencies and Guyana's public health and national security framework.

articles.title: Battlefield 6 Release Time: Editions, gameplay, story, platforms, how to preload, file size and what to expect at launch
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Battlefield 6 is launching on October 10, 2025, and will be available on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S. Players can choose between the Standard and Phantom editions, with the latter offering additional cosmetic items and early access. At launch, the game will include nine maps, various multiplayer modes, campaign missions, and 45 weapons.

articles.title: Wendy's Unveils Turnaround to Revitalize Brand
articles.author: Wall Street Journal
articles.summary: Wendy's has launched 'Project Fresh,' a new strategic plan. This plan aims to revitalize the brand, reignite growth, accelerate profitability, and enhance shareholder value.

articles.title: The CEO of 'AI companion' startup Replika is stepping aside to launch a new company
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Eugenia Kuyda, founder of Replika, has unveiled a new AI startup called Wabi. Wabi is a social platform designed for creating and sharing mini-apps, allowing users to discover, remix, and share these applications for daily life.

articles.title: Air Jordan 12 ‘Pearl Pink' — For Girls Who Swore They'd Never Wear Jordans: Release ...
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Air Jordan is launching a new 'Pearl Pink' colorway for its Air Jordan 12 sneakers. The release date, price, and other details of the new product are forthcoming.

articles.title: Epson Reinvents Printing and Projection at Exclusive Krasota Experience
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Epson unveiled its latest product range at an exclusive media dinner.

articles.title: When AI Undermines Product Strategy, And What To Do Instead
articles.author: Anne T. Griffin
articles.summary: Apple introduced AI notification summaries but temporarily paused the feature after users found inaccuracies. LinkedIn added AI prompt questions for premium users, but rolled them back less than a year later due to unhelpful prompts. These examples highlight the importance of aligning AI features with product strategy and user expectations.

articles.title: Dreame Technology's X50 Ultra Robot Vacuum Named to TIME's List of the Best Inventions of 2025
articles.author: Montana Standard
articles.summary: ProLeap™ System introduces an industry-first step-climbing capability. This innovative feature aims to redefine autonomous home cleaning.

articles.title: Luminar Mobile 2.0 for Android Brings Smarter, Faster Photo Editing
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Skylum released Luminar Mobile for Android Version 2.0. The new version introduces several new features.
